sentences.sentence: This includes Vaseline, baby oil, mineral oil and cooking oils.
sentences.translation: 包括凡士林、婴儿油、矿物油及食用油。

sentences.sentence: If you can't find any eye makeup remover, try baby oil or Vaseline to take off your eye makeup. It totally works!
sentences.translation: 如果手头暂时没有卸妆油，可以用婴儿油或凡士林代替，你会发现它们同样有效。

sentences.sentence: Put concealer under your eyes, curl your eyelashes, and then use a tiny dab (use your finger) of Vaseline on them.
sentences.translation: 在眼袋处涂上遮瑕膏，夹出弯曲的眼睫毛，再用手指涂上凡士林，方便又快捷。
